snippet: Though the Patriots’ nimble receivers were running circles around the Giants linebackers early in the game, the Giants defense eventually persevered, with a little help from the offensive line.
abstract: New England Patriots nimble receivers run circles around the New York Giants linebackers early in the game, but the Giants defense eventually perseveres, pressuring Patriots quarterback Tom Brady into a mistake.
lead_paragraph: Though the Patriots’ nimble receivers were running circles around the Giants linebackers early in the game, the Giants defense eventually persevered, with a little help from the offensive line.

headline.seo: Super Bowl — Dented by Patriots’ Game Plan, Defense Holds Together
headline.main: Dented by Patriots’ Game Plan, Defense Holds Together
headline.print_headline: Dented by Patriots’ Game Plan, Defense Holds Together
